sentences.en: Don't be too wordy, of course.
For example, avoid wordy descriptions for command names or messages.
sentences.cn: 例如, 避免对命令名或者消息使用文字描述.

sentences.en: His wordy and empty speech was a frost.
sentences.cn: 他的冗长空洞的讲话使人厌烦.

sentences.en: I thought the professor's speech was a little wordy.
sentences.cn: 我认为那教授的讲演有点罗嗦.

sentences.en: I try for simplicity. I am often too wordy.
sentences.cn: 越简单越好. 我平常太罗嗦.

sentences.en: If you must use assembly, to be wordy when commenting.
sentences.cn: 如果必须使用汇编, 尝试逐句注释.

sentences.en: Newspapers of the day printed long wordy editorials.
sentences.cn: 那天的报纸上发表了许多冗长的社论.

sentences.en: Proceedings were delayed by wordy disputes.
sentences.cn: 会议公报由于措辞争议而推迟发表.

sentences.en: The article is good in content, only it's a bit wordy.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章内容不错, 只是文字略嫌罗唆.

sentences.en: The chapter is mostly wordy rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 这一章多为冗长的华丽词藻。

sentences.en: The essay is too wordy, you'd better condense it.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章太过冗长, 要简缩一下.

sentences.en: The wordy lord left his sword on & n obr bsp ; the wvrld.
sentences.cn: 多话的 君主 把他的剑留在了世界上.

sentences.en: The wordy lord left his sword on the world.
sentences.cn: 多话的君主把他的剑留在了世上.

sentences.en: This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章语言繁芜,最好能再精炼一下.
